name: NEO
description:
NEO Near - Earth - Object.

Sci-fi action adventure puzzle video game. Futuristic design 3d environment & first person view.

You are an artificial intelligence specialist, and you take part in a space expedition whose mission is to explore and investigate a strange and mysterious space installation... the NEO... Near - Earth - Object.

Overcome the obstacles, enemies and puzzles.

- FPS gameplay mode
- Over 50 different original futuristic 3d environment
- Over 100 different enemies (animals, creatures, monsters, aliens, zombies, soldiers, robots, A.I)
- A wide range of futuristic weapons, vehicles and super powers
- Over 40 original and unique puzzles
- humoristic dialogues with in-game characters

Please note that the game is in an early stage and many aspects of the game will change and improve.
Official release date: 02-20-20
Demo release: end of 2018 or early 2019
